title: Foxworth Friday: Cowboys' scandal, why NBA stars make bad GM's
description:
Bomani Jones and Domonique Foxworth discuss the scandal surrounding the Cowboys, who paid $2.4 million to settle cheerleaders' voyeurism allegations against a senior team executive (1:03). Plus, the guys argue over why NBA stars like Kevin Durant and LeBron James have or have not placed their faith in stronger organizations in their pursuit of championships (24:35).
